mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board (title, content, writer,categoryid) VALUES (#{title},#{content},(SELECT id FROM tbl_user WHERE username = #{writer}),(SELECT categoryid FROM tbl_board_category WHERE categoryname = #{categoryName}))
mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, content, (SELECT username FROM tbl_user WHERE tbl_user.id = tbl_board.writer) writer, regdate, viewcnt, (SELECT categoryname from tbl_board_category WHERE tbl_board_category.categoryid = tbl_board.categoryid) categoryname FROM tbl_board WHERE bno > 0 ORDER BY bno DESC , regdate DESC

SELECT bno, title, content, (SELECT username FROM tbl_user WHERE tbl_user.id = tbl_board.writer) writer, regdate, viewcnt FROM tbl_board WHERE bno > 0 AND categoryid = (SELECT categoryid FROM tbl_board_category where categoryname = #{categoryName}) ORDER BY bno DESC , regdate DESC
SELECT bno, title, content, (SELECT username FROM tbl_user WHERE tbl_user.id = tbl_board.writer) writer, regdate, viewcnt, categoryid FROM tbl_board WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title =#{title}, content =#{content} where bno = #{bno}
